item.title: Visual Layouts Filtrify & Isotope Visual Layouts – will they work with your WordPress Theme?
item.description: Hi Damien, I’m about to start using your amazing plugins and was wondering if you could offer me some advice. Is it possible for me to use your filtering capability with this WordPress theme … To be honest … I think I’m better off with just the plugins. Thanks I recently received this email and thought I’d write up a few notes on my plugins. Right or Wrong … If you like the style of your theme, WordPress plugins are there to extend the function of your site.

item.title: Visual Layouts – Isotope Filtrify and custom WordPress taxonomies
item.description: Creating tag and category based filtering is easy using my new plugin Visual Layouts Filtrify .. and now I want to show you that custom post types and custom taxonomies in WordPress are also handled with this new plugin. Using two of my plugins, you can create a visual grid of your posts, photos, portfolio, products and even use it to create your own WooCommerce e-commerce product page without having to get a new theme.

item.title: Just Announced: Isotope Visual Layouts plugin gets Filtrify for tags and filtering
item.description: Visual Layouts Filtrify is my newest plugin for WordPress and my first plugin to extend Isotope Visual Post Layouts. What does Visual Layouts Filtrify do? Add drop-down menus and filtering to your website Works with tags and categories (no configuration) Works with my Isotope Visual Post Layouts. My very, very, very popular Isotope Visual Post Layouts — more than 1,000 downloads so far!

item.title: Isotope + filtrify + WordPress = No Sweat
item.description: I’ve been busy this weekend catching up on some development work for my favourite WordPress plugin Visual Post Layouts which uses Isotope. Today I’ve integrated filtrifywhich makes it easy to choose your posts by Category.
